coreAttributes.name: Unspeakable Meat
coreAttributes.description: A bag full of comically shaped dinosaur nuggets. There's no telling what they're made of, as it is too spongy for proper assessment. Under the label appears to be the tagline: "So delicious, they may go extinct!"
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel like an apex predator...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the bag of meat from their inventory, the treats looking slightly overcooked, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] eating. The augmented taste, and slightly cold feel of the meat dominates [npc.her] mouth, but [npc.she] [npc.do]n't take any time to really notice, as [npc.she] #IF(npc.getFaceType()==FACE_TYPE_Aurelia_Raptor_face) [npc.verb(start)] using [npc.her] sharp raptor teeth to tear the nuggets into smaller bits, and in a matter of moments [npc.has] completely emptied the bag. #ELSE [npc.verb(start)] chewing on the deceptively tough nuggets, the taste bringing out an immensely primal glint in [npc.her] eyes, and in a matter of moments [npc.has] managed to consume the others. #ENDIF
